title: Secretary of State (United Kingdom)
summary: Her majesty's principal secretaries of state, better known as secretaries of state, are senior ministers of the Crown in the Government of the United Kingdom.[1] Secretaries of state head most major government departments[2] and make up the majority of the Cabinet of the United Kingdom.[3] There are currently 16 different secretaries of state.[3] They are all also currently members of Parliament.[3]
